metadata.title: CVE-2021-44465 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Improper access control in Odoo Community 13.0 and earlier and OdooEnterprise 13.0 and earlier allows authenticated attackers to subscribe toreceive future notifications and comments related to arbitrary businessrecords in the system, via crafted RPC requests.

criterions.comment: odoo package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
